title: SB 1159
content: The people of the State of California enact the following. The Legislature aims to make cost, quality, and equity data available to promote innovative healthcare approaches in California. A data atlas will be used to assess healthcare needs, control costs, improve quality, reduce disparities, increase transparency, and enhance health outcomes for all populations. The California Health and Human Services Agency is tasked with researching the development of a cost, quality, and equity data atlas in line with healthcare information education. This initiative aims to promote innovative healthcare approaches, control costs, improve quality, reduce disparities, increase transparency, and enhance health outcomes for all populations. The California Health and Human Services Agency is researching the development of a cost, quality, and equity data atlas for healthcare. This includes identifying key data submitters and analyzing potential models used in other states for inclusion in the atlas. The data to be included consists of information from health care service plans, insurers, providers, self-insured employers, and trust administrators. The California Health and Human Services Agency is researching the development of a cost, quality, and equity data atlas for healthcare. This includes gathering pricing information for health care items and services, determining the impacts of social determinants of health, and collecting clinical data from various healthcare entities. The California Health and Human Services Agency is researching the development of a cost, quality, and equity data atlas for healthcare. This includes assessing governance structures, funding approaches, potential collaborations, and consulting with various healthcare stakeholders and experts. The agency may also enter into contracts or agreements for research purposes. The California Health and Human Services Agency may enter contracts to conduct research on a healthcare data atlas. Results must be made public by March 1, 2017. Federal funds can be used for this purpose.
